page.title: 03Education in Stock
page.content: Stock village school is a Primary School which means the children start work at five and leave at eleven years old. They have 184 in the school divided into six classes. The headteacheris a lady and it is a mixed school.It is a state school but they wear a uniform which is red and grey. In the summer the girls had red and white checked dresses.At eleven they go to Mayflower Comprehensive,Billericay,or Mrs. Pears Private School. Also the chidren do the eleven plus, this year one child passed and will go to Southend High School.
